data.actual_result: The invalid name message appears, but the edit menu immediately closes.
data.expected_result: The invalid name message should appear, and the edit menu should stay.
data.short_description: Editing a channel to have an invalid name displays the invalid name red text for only a fraction of a second before closing the edit channel screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Channel Edit menu for a text channel. - Edit the channel name to be something invalid (i.e. a single hyphen). - The red invalid name text appears briefly before the edit menu is closed.
